text:
admetrics | Frankfurt, Germany | Full-Time | ONSITE | Frontend Developer

You will be part of a cross functional team that consists of talented developers in Frankfurt am Main to solve some very challenging technical problems.

You will work closely with the UI designer and product manager to help shape a product that is able to provide insights into enormous amounts of data in real time using Javascript, NodeJS, HTML and CSS.

Job posting: http://www.admetrics.io/en/career_job/:frontend_developer
